page.title: 05SEWAGE WORKS,Yeoford area.
page.content: {Yeoford}sewage works is a little way away from{Yeoford.}All the machines there are worked by electricity, which is quite unusual because most machines at sewage works are worked by water. First, the sewage is put into a machine which cleans out all the things that shouldn't be there. Then it runs into a kind of round swimming pool, which has a machine arm that goes round and clears all the dirt from the surface of the water. Then it runs into the edge of a kind of big swimming pool full of stones. The stones were small on top and got bigger as you dug down. It is then sprinkled onto the stones and all the dirty water stays on the stones, while all the cleaner water comes out of drains.This runs into the{River {Yeo.}There is going to be a supply of clean water to be used in a drought.
